title: Soma Stocks the UNO Compatible IRD Power Ratchet Brake Levers
content:
Have you heard of the Ene Ciclo UNO Shifter, the world’s first stock friction shifter that shifts up to 12-speeds? The IRD Power Ratchet Brake Lever Set – in stock now at SOMA ($169.95) – now includes a mount for it. These brake levers still include mounts for left and right vintage and modern Shimano downtube shifters, but now the Uno mount has been added, increasing the possibilities.

Check out more at SOMA.

 

The post Soma Stocks the UNO Compatible IRD Power Ratchet Brake Levers appeared first on The Radavist.
